Reference

All functions

chrome_connect()

Connect to Chrome Remote

chrome_dump_pdf()

"Print" to PDF

chrome_read_html()

Read a URL via headless Chrome and return the renderd <body> innerHTML DOM elements

chrome_shot()

Capture a screenshot

chrome_version()

Get Chrome version

decapitate()

Run headless

decapitated

Headless 'Chrome' Orchestration

instrument()

Instrument Chrome

ws_poll()

Consume event

ws_url()

Get the Chrome Remote ws URL
